name: Balance This Game!
description:
This game is in development. If you have questions, comments, or feedback, please let me know! For every $50 this game earns, I will develop more to it based on popular suggestions. Otherwise, development will end at the end of Devtober 2021.

Controls
  • Camera Pan: right click + drag or WASD or arrow keys
  • Camera Zoom: mouse scroll or +/- or E/Q
  • Interact: Click on stuff!
  • Double/half values: shift + click or right click
  • Toggle pause: spacebar (or click icon in upper left)
  • Toggle game speed: tab (or click icon in upper left)
